mapper.insert: insert into SHOPCART (SHID, USID, PRID, SHQUANTITY, SHCHECKED, SHCREATETIME, SHUPDTIME) values (#{shid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{usid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shquantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shchecked,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{shcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shupdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update SHOPCART set USID = #{usid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRID = #{prid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SHQUANTITY = #{shquantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SHCHECKED = #{shchecked,jdbcType=CHAR}, SHCREATETIME = #{shcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SHUPDTIME = #{shupdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where SHID = #{shid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SHID, USID, PRID, SHQUANTITY, SHCHECKED, SHCREATETIME, SHUPDTIME from SHOPCART
